Class NetworkHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utilities.Observable<MessageEvent>
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.NetworkHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<MessageEvent>, java.lang.Runnable
public class NetworkHandler
extends Observable<MessageEvent>
implements java.lang.Runnable, Observer<MessageEvent>

  • Constructor Details

    • NetworkHandler

      public NetworkHandler​(java.lang.String ip) throws java.io.IOException
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Launching method for the network handler thread. A heartbeat service is instanciated, as well as the input handler.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • update

      public void update​(MessageEvent message)
      Manager of the output connections. Sends a message to the server.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer<MessageEvent>
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be sent to the server

    • heartbeatRunnable

      public void heartbeatRunnable()
      Manager of the connection. At a constant rate, a heartbeat message is sent to the server. The rate at which the messages are sent is SOCKET_TIMEOUT/2

    • shutdownAll

      public void shutdownAll()
      Shutdown of all the connection services. Closes the input and output stream.

    • connectionError

      public void connectionError()
      Management of the connection errors from the server. e.g. Server not sending heartbeat messages anymore, server not reachable.

    • addObserver

      public void addObserver​(Observer<MessageEvent> observer)
      Manager of the network handler observer. Only one class at time can get updates from the net handler.
      Overrides:
      addObserver in class Observable<MessageEvent>
      Parameters:
      observer - the new observer
